action_points.description: Implement an immediate mandate for patch management policies to address new vulnerabilities in Microsoft Exchange servers and other critical infrastructure, ensuring all patches are applied within the recommended timelines.
Develop a comprehensive strategy to bolster defenses against AI-enhanced phishing attacks, including advanced employee awareness training and deployment of sophisticated email filtering technologies.

Establish a task force dedicated to security posture assessment and improvement for sectors we serve that are particularly vulnerable to ransomware attacks, such as education and healthcare institutions.
